column1: Consensual Affine Transformations for Partial Valuation Aggregation
AAAI Technical Track: Humans and AI
We consider the task of aggregating scores provided by experts that each have scored only a subset of all objects to be rated. Since experts only see a subset of all objects
column2: they lack global information on the overall quality of all objects
column3: as well as the global range in quality. Inherently
column4: the only reliable information we get from experts is therefore the relative scores over the objects that they have scored each.
